Hi Cody,

I don't seem to be able to reproduce those exceptions you get.
Ar=
e you sure you completly replaced/removed the broken lib (and not
just adde=
d the new lib into the lib folder?)

Would it be possible for you to hand m=
e over your order.xml and
seeds.txt so I can try with your exact setup?

Re=
gards
  Olaf Freyer

lems do match into one of two categories:
> >

r is caused by documents simply being to 
> huge
> > (Almost 3MB in your ca=
se). The class comments of JerichoExtractor
> > mentions limiting the docum=
ent size to be processed by this 
> processor
> > (I have the limit set to =
700kB) Another possible workarround might 
> be
> > simply increasing your =
VMs stacksize (using the -Xss command line
> > option in Suns JVM)
> > 
> >=
 2) Those NullPointerExceptions might simply be caused by a bug in 
> the
>=
 > jerichoHTML parser library. You can read about the bug over there:
> > h=
ttp://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?
> func=3Ddetail&aid=3D1597587&grou=
p_id=3D101067&atid=3D628968

s the mentioned bug
